item.title: List accomplishments or resign, Musk tells US federal workers
item.description: The weekend email comes as Elon Musk leads an effort to aggressively curtail the government workforce.

item.title: One dead and police hurt in knife attack in France
item.description: President Emmanuel Macron said there was "no doubt it was an Islamist terrorist attack".

item.title: Archaeologists may have found pharaoh's second tomb
item.description: The potential find comes just days after the announcement of the discovery of King Thutmose II's tomb.

item.title: From Baywatch to toxic waste - LA's iconic beaches unrecognisable after fires
item.description: Under orders from President Trump, the EPA is trying to fast track the clean-up of toxic debris from LA's fires.

item.title: Invisible Losses: Tens of thousands fighting for Russia are dying unnoticed on the frontline in Ukraine
item.description: The Kremlinâ€™s recruitment policy is shielding society from the true impact of war.
